Display distinct errors from tune objects

Source: R/tune_results.R
show_notes.Rd

Display distinct errors from tune objects

Usage

show_notes(x, n = 10)

Arguments

x

An object of class tune_results.

n

An integer for how many unique notes to show.

Value

Invisibly, x. Function is called for side-effects and printing.
